_sText:
This is port of a series of three Quake 3 maps by Random Mapper. They all had the same theme, so I thought it would be a good idea to combine them. A decent run is probably within the 1:20 range. I added a couple of (very) small things to make navigating the map more clear, and I added a booster at the start of the second stage to make the initial jump less annoying.

Have fun.

Original Maps:
https://ws.q3df.org/map/rm_n1/
https://ws.q3df.org/map/rm_n2/
https://ws.q3df.org/map/rm_n3/
